# blendMode

**Instance Property**

The blend mode to apply to the overlay.

## Declaration

```swift
var blendMode: CGBlendMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Choose the blend mode from one of the possible [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGBlendMode] enumerations.

## Attributes of the overlay

- **overlay**: The overlay object containing the data for drawing.
- **alpha**: The amount of transparency to apply to the overlay.
- **contentScaleFactor**: The scale factor for drawing the overlay’s content.
